Text:
A8 V6. Image quality is no better than fair: it looks rough and lacks detail. (And that's on a standard definition screen.) Check the sample, it's reasonably accurate.

If you must have a copy of this movie that fits on a 700MiB CD, here it is. Otherwise try this torrent: https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6125330/Howard.Marks.Mr.Nice.2010.DVDRip.XviD

English speakers should note that the Dutch subs are hardcoded: you can't turn 'em off.
